name: Bubble Shooter Breaker Mania - Sister Bubble
name_original: Bubble Shooter Breaker Mania - Sister Bubble
description:
A Bubble game you can touch screen with same color group of bubbles to disappear them.
destroy the same color bubbles and achieve the mission targets.
Bubble Breaker Legend is a game where you touch the same color bubbles and destroy them.
Try you best to destroy more bubbles by a single click and you will get higher scores.
It seems easy but hard to master.
The game involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
It is adventure and fantastic game.
Features:
- Lovely scene with beautiful music in bubble game.
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
- Many level mission target to challenge
- Exploding boom, horizon thunder, vertical thunder, locked game effects, gray & lock cells  captured the pets, last magic time.
Once you start, you will can not stop this game.
Please email us if you have any advice.
we will appreciate that if you give us a rate..
